Eye of the Void

miscellaneous (lvl 4)

item id [id]: 315
magic penetration [pen]: 2
magic resistance [mr]: -2
horrormark chance [taint]: 3%
(unremovable [cursed], won't-be-picked-up [nofind], spirit-sight [spiritsight], magiceye [magiceye])

Requires 5S to forge (S1)

This eye, taken from a dead Void being, should be put in the eye socket of a newly removed eye. By doing this, the patient will open a path to the Void into which he can see with his new eye. This will enable him to cast spells more effectively, but he will also be more vulnerable to enemy spells.
